title: Zero-Click AI Vulnerability Exposes Microsoft 365 Copilot Data Without User Interaction
description: A novel attack technique named EchoLeak has been characterized as a "zero-click" artificial intelligence (AI) vulnerability that allows bad actors to exfiltrate sensitive data from Microsoft 365 Copilot's context sans any user interaction.
